name: 城市工人模拟器
description:
In this game, you will act as an ordinary person, coming to a new city and start your life. You are not rich and do not master many life skills. Therefore, in order to survive, you must choose to take part in one of various jobs.

SELECTING A JOB

School Guard-Earning $30 per day, easy to do, no skill required
Factory Worker-Earning $40 per day, difficult to do, no skill required
Deliveries Person-Earning $45 per day, easy to do, required for a bike
Taxi Driver-Earning $60 per day, easy to do, required for a car

EARNING MONEY AFTER WORK

Bank-Save your money in the bank and receive interest every day
Racing Circuit-Win a car race and gain up to $500
Park-Earn few money through random events

SPENDING YOUR MONEY

Clothes Store-Buy various clothes and trousers
Restaurant-Buy food to keep you healthy
Convenience Shop-Buy various small items
